title: A New Security Layer for macOS Takes Aim at Admin Errors Before Hackers Do
description: A design firm is editing a new campaign video on a MacBook Pro. The creative director opens a collaboration app that quietly requests microphone and camera permissions. MacOS is supposed to flag that, but in this case, the checks are loose. The app gets access anyway.
